query:
SELECT pg.id, pg.name, COUNT(c.id) as campaign_count 
FROM performance_groups pg 
LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON c.performanceGroupId = pg.id 
GROUP BY pg.id, pg.name
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT pg.id, pg.name, COUNT(c.id) as campaign_count 
FROM performance_groups pg 
LEFT JOIN campaigns c ON c.performanceGroupId = pg.id 
GROUP BY pg.id, pg.name
